config: Justia Connect Pro is about more: more sharing, learning, savings, and growth for your practice. Starting today, we’re giving Pro members even more!

Justia Connect members get $200 in Justia Credit* when they upgrade to Justia Connect Pro. Now, your Justia Connect Pro Membership pays for itself** when you purchase eligible Justia Marketing Solutions!

*Conditions apply. See Justia Connect Pro Credit Terms of Use for details.

** When paid annually, Justia Connect Pro Memberships are $16.65/month or $199.80/year. Monthly membership plans cost $19.99/month or $239.88/year.
Justia Connect Pro is about more: more sharing, learning, savings, and growth for your practice. Starting today, we’re giving Pro members even more!

Justia Connect members get $200 in Justia Credit* when they upgrade to Justia Connect Pro. Now, your Justia Connect Pro Membership pays for itself** when you purchase eligible Justia Marketing Solutions!

1. If you currently have a Justia Connect Basic Membership and have never been a Justia Connect Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive a $200 Justia Credit applicable toward the new purchase or renewal of a Justia Premium Placement in the Justia Lawyer Directory, a Justia Elevate website, or Justia Amplify PPC management services.
  2. If you are currently a Justia Connect Pro and have not redeemed your Justia Credit, you now have an extra $100 credit available to apply toward the new purchase or renewal of a Justia Premium Placement in the Justia Lawyer Directory, a Justia Elevate website, or Justia Amplify PPC management services.
  3. If you are currently a Justia Connect Pro and have redeemed your Justia Credit, we’re giving you an extra $100 too for this membership term that may be applied to the same product you already purchased using your credit. A member of our team will be in touch soon to discuss the details, or give us a call at (888) 587-8421

*Conditions apply. See Justia Connect Pro Credit Terms of Use for details.

** When paid annually, Justia Connect Pro Memberships are $16.65/month or $199.80/year. Monthly membership plans cost $19.99/month or $239.88/year.
